comment: A special shout out to Humza Bawaneh for his ability to come out of the office , flirt for seconds with a bagger , then tell everyone he will not bag , but go work on the shelves . All this while lines are packed with customers and the cashiers help .
amr:
# ::snt A special shout out to Humza Bawaneh for his ability to come out of the office , flirt for seconds with a bagger , then tell everyone he will not bag , but go work on the shelves . All this while lines are packed with customers and the cashiers help .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shout-01
            :ARG1 (c / capable-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Humza"
                              :op2 "Bawaneh"))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (c2 / come-01
                              :ARG1 p
                              :direction (o / out-of
                                    :op1 (o2 / office)))
                        :op2 (f / flirt-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (b / bag-01))
                              :duration (m2 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (s2 / second))))
                        :op3 (t2 / tell-01
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (b2 / bag-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 p)
                              :ARG2 (e / everyone)
                              :time (t3 / then)
                              :ARG1-of (c3 / contrast-01
                                    :ARG2 (g / go-02
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG4 (w / work-01
                                                :ARG0 p
                                                :location (s3 / shelf)))))))
            :ARG2 p
            :ARG1-of (s4 / special-02))
      :snt2 (t4 / this
            :time (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / pack-01
                        :ARG1 (l / line)
                        :ARG2 (p4 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / customer)
                                    :ARG2 c4))))
            :op2 (h2 / help-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (c5 / cash-01)))))

comment: I'm sorry to hear about your experience . What store location are you referring to ? - Caroline
